folder: Bentley Avenue & Arthur Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Bentley Avenue - Arthur Hill Road
text:
Bentley Avenue, east side, north of Arthur Kill Road, near the Perth Amboy ferry depot, showing the Salt Air Hotel, owned by S. N. Broderson in 1907 and by Mrs. Cole in 1898.

P. L. Sperr

April 23, 1929
